attributes.action: Please Government make it law for drink drivers to be banned from driving for life
attributes.additional_details: Drink drivers are a danger on our roads, but are the penalties if caught tough enough to deter them from doing it in the first place, We at Local Road Watch UK don't think so, we feel the law should be changed so that anyone caught in the act of this anti-social behaviour can never drive on UK roads again, the government needs to get tough on this. Support this petition and lets make the roads a safer place.
